org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.fx.policies

Interface IFXOnRotatePolicy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAdaptable.Bound<IVisualPart<javafx.scene.Node,? extends javafx.scene.Node>>, IPolicy<javafx.scene.Node>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FXRotateSelectedOnRotatePolicy

    public interface IFXOnRotatePolicy
extends IPolicy<javafx.scene.Node>
    An interaction policy that implements the IFXOnRotatePolicy interface will be notified about touch rotate events by the FXRotateTool.

    • Property Summary

      • Properties inherited from interface org.eclipse.gef4.common.adapt.IAdaptable.Bound

    • Method Detail

      • rotate

        void rotate(javafx.scene.input.RotateEvent e)
        Continuous reaction to rotation gestures. Called continuously on finger movement, after the gesture has been started, and before it has been finished.
        Parameters:
        e - The original RotateEvent.

      • rotationAborted

        void rotationAborted()
        Reaction to the unexpected finish of a rotate gesture.

      • rotationFinished

        void rotationFinished(javafx.scene.input.RotateEvent e)
        Reaction to the finish of rotate gestures.
        Parameters:

        Reaction to the detection of rotate gestures.
        Parameters:
